name: Puzzle - LINES AND KNOTS 2
description:
Logical puzzle game for meditation and relaxation.
The goal of the game is to assemble a puzzle consisting of knots.
Clear mechanics: swap hexagons with lines.

▪ 132 levels
▪ Achievements
